r=0;r<e.length;r+=3)t+=Number(e[r])*3,t+=Number(e[r+1])*7,t+=Number(e[r+2])||0;return`${e}${Math.ceil(t/10)*10-t}`}mask(e,t,r){e=e||4,t=t==null?!0:t,r=r==null?!0:r;let n="";for(let i=0;i<e;i++)n=n+"#";return n=r?["...",n].join(""):n,n=t?["(",n,")"].join(""):n,n=this.Helpers.replaceSymbolWithNumber(n),n}amount(e=0,t=1e3,r=2,n="",i){const
